Sentencas: Solid oxide electrolyzer cell (SOEC) can efficiently reduce CO2/H2O into CO/H2 using renewable powers.
Titulo: Self-adaptive heat management of solid oxide electrolyzer cell under fluctuating power supply

Sentencas: But the fluctuating nature of renewable energy can significantly change the temperature field and cause thermal fatigue even mechanical failure.
Titulo: Self-adaptive heat management of solid oxide electrolyzer cell under fluctuating power supply

Sentencas: Herein, we propose a self-adaptive heat management method of SOEC by coupling SOEC with an in-situ thermochemical energy storage (TES) section.
Titulo: Self-adaptive heat management of solid oxide electrolyzer cell under fluctuating power supply

Sentencas: Co3O4/CoO redox pair is selected as the TES material for heat management during the exothermic and endothermic operating conditions.
Titulo: Self-adaptive heat management of solid oxide electrolyzer cell under fluctuating power supply

Sentencas: 2D dynamic models are developed to study the effects of TES section on the SOEC performances with a special attention on the temperature fluctuation.
Titulo: Self-adaptive heat management of solid oxide electrolyzer cell under fluctuating power supply

Sentencas: Results show that the addition of TES section can reduce temperature fluctuation by 73 %, from 119.2 K to 31.7 K. Besides, the maximum temperature gradient and the surface maximum temperature difference at 1.5 V are reduced to 2.62 K/mm and 30 K, respectively, which are 65 % and 82 % lower than those without TES section.
Titulo: Self-adaptive heat management of solid oxide electrolyzer cell under fluctuating power supply

Sentencas: An inlet temperature of 1123 K is found to be the best operating condition for the Co3O4/ CoO pair in inhibiting the temperature fluctuation of the cell, where the standard deviation is 8.51.
Titulo: Self-adaptive heat management of solid oxide electrolyzer cell under fluctuating power supply

Sentencas: This study provides a novel strategy for efficient heat management and safe operation of SOEC under fluctuating working conditions.
Titulo: Self-adaptive heat management of solid oxide electrolyzer cell under fluctuating power supply
